Name: Applied Optics and Optical Design, Part One (Dover Books on Physics)

ReviewList.Text: There are too many mathematical details to suit me.  I want to understand the pluses and minuses of various astronomical telescopes, but I don't want all the math behind why.  This book is meant for someone who wants to design telescopes and other optics.  I just want to look through them.
Enjoy doing business... Sells quality products...
